article_text:
A New York Police Department detective was apparently shot accidentally by a colleague and a suspect was also wounded when a heroin bust turned violent in Brooklyn Tuesday evening, authorities said.

The plainclothes detective, who is assigned to the Brooklyn North Narcotics division, was shot once in the shoulder while trying to arrest the...
